liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

command.label: Command
command.tooltip:
Name of the command.
Input format: !<command name> <user target> [amount]

alias.label: Alias
alias.tooltip: Name of the alias. (Usually a short call for the command)

defaultPoints.label: Default amount
defaultPoints.tooltip: Set how many points is given if no amount is entered.

outputMsg.label: Output message
outputMsg.tooltip: Message to display when successfully given points. use '$user', '$points','$currency' as replacements
